trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] proxy of a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] proxy for en <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: CollectionViewSource is a proxy for a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class, or a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>.
trans-unit.target: CollectionViewSource er en proxy for en <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>klasse, eller en avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: CollectionViewSource enables [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] code to set the commonly used <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> properties, passing these settings to the underlying view.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for CollectionViewSource [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] kode for å angi den brukte <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>Egenskaper for sending av disse innstillingene til den underliggende visningen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: CollectionViewSource has a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.View%2A> property that holds the actual view and a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A> property that holds the source collection.
trans-unit.target: CollectionViewSource har en <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.View%2A>-egenskap som inneholder den faktiske visningen og en <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A>-egenskap som inneholder kildesamlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can think of a collection view as the layer on top of the binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself.
trans-unit.target: Du kan se en samling visning som lag på bindingen kildesamlingen som gjør det mulig å navigere og vise samlingen basert på sortering, filter og gruppe spørringer uten å endre underliggende kildesamlingen seg selv.

trans-unit.source: If the source collection implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface, the changes raised by the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event are propagated to the views.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kildesamlingen implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>grensesnitt endringene oppstå i <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>hendelsen er overført til visningene.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Because views do not change the underlying source collections, each source collection can have multiple views associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Fordi visninger, ikke endres de underliggende datakilden samlingene, kan hver kildesamlingen ha flere visninger som er knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: For example, you may have a collection of `Task` objects.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel ha en samling av `Task` objekter.

trans-unit.source: With the use of views, you can display that same data in different ways.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av visninger, kan du vise den samme dataene på forskjellige måter.

trans-unit.source: For example, on the left side of your page you may want to show tasks sorted by priority, and on the right side, grouped by area.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel venstre på siden kanskje du vil vise oppgaver som er sortert etter prioritet, og til høyre, gruppert etter område.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Binding to Collections section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se bindingen til samlinger delen av [Data Binding oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning filtering data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om visningen samlingen støtter aktivere eller deaktivere filtrere data i sanntid.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live filtering on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis visningen samlingen støtter slå live eller deaktivere filtrering; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien [avhengighet egenskapen verdien prioriteten](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CanChangeLiveFiltering*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CanChangeLiveFiltering*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om visningen samlingen støtter slå gruppering data i sanntid på eller av.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live grouping on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis visningen samlingen støtter live gruppering for å slå på eller av; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>. Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CanChangeLiveGrouping*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CanChangeLiveGrouping*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CanChangeLiveGrouping*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning sorting data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om visningen samlingen støtter aktivere eller deaktivere sortere data i sanntid.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live sorting on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis visningen samlingen støtter slå live sortering eller deaktivere; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien [avhengighet egenskapen verdien prioriteten](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CanChangeLiveSorting*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CanChangeLiveSorting*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CanChangeLiveSorting*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired view type.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ønsket visningstypen.

trans-unit.source: This can be used when you want to create a custom view on top of a collection of a specific type that is different from the default type.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan brukes når du vil opprette en egendefinert visning på en samling av en spesifikk type som er ulik standardtypen.

trans-unit.source: This property may only be set during initialization.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan bare angis under initialisering.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *typeName* The name of the that is contained by this view.
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen | ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *typeName* navnet på den som finnes i denne visningen.

trans-unit.source: Note the use of the [x:Type Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to specify a type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til bruken av den [x: Type Markup utvidelsen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) til å angi en type i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The desired view type.
trans-unit.target: Ønsket visningstypen.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CollectionViewType*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CollectionViewType*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.CollectionViewType*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture that is used for operations such as sorting and comparisons.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kulturen som brukes til operasjoner, for eksempel sortering og sammenligninger.

trans-unit.source: This property is forwarded to any collection view created from this <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen videresendes til noen samlinger-visningen som er opprettet fra denne <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ietfLanguageTag* A string used to set the .
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *ietfLanguageTag* en streng som brukes til å angi .

trans-unit.source: This string is used to internally call.
trans-unit.target: Denne strengen brukes til å kalle internt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag%2A>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details on the string format, see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om strengformatet, kan du se <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The culture that is used for operations such as sorting and comparisons.
trans-unit.target: Kulturen som brukes til operasjoner, for eksempel sortering og sammenligninger.

trans-unit.source: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.
trans-unit.target: Angir en Utsett syklus som du kan bruke til å slå sammen endringer i visningen og forsinkelse automatisk oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope.
trans-unit.target: Vanlig bruk er å opprette en `using` område med denne metoden, og Plasser flere endring av visningen anrop innenfor området.

trans-unit.source: This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.
trans-unit.target: Dette forsinker automatiske oppdateringer til Utsett syklus er avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IDisposable> object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IDisposable>objekt som du kan bruke til å fjerne kall objektet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Provides filtering logic.
trans-unit.target: Gir filtrering logic.

trans-unit.source: Views can apply a filter to a collection.
trans-unit.target: Visninger kan bruke et filter i en samling.

trans-unit.source: This means that although an item might exist in the collection, a particular view is intended to show only a certain subset of the full collection.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at selv om det finnes kanskje et element i samlingen, en bestemt visning skal vises bare et bestemt delsett av samlingen fullstendig.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to set an event handler to provide filtering logic.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å angi en hendelsesbehandling oppgi filtrering logic.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the default view for the given source.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer standardvisningen for den angitte kilden.

trans-unit.source: This default view is never affiliated with any <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> objects.
trans-unit.target: Denne standardvisningen er ikke knyttet til noen <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>

trans-unit.source: All collections have a default <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>.
trans-unit.target: Alle samlinger har en standardverdi <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: WPF always binds to a view rather than a collection.
trans-unit.target: WPF binding alltid til en visning i stedet for en samling.

trans-unit.source: If you bind directly to a collection, WPF actually binds to the default view for that collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du binder direkte til en samling, WPF faktisk binder seg til standardvisningen for samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This default view is shared by all bindings to the collection, which causes all direct bindings to the collection to share the sort, filter, group, and current item characteristics of the one default view.
trans-unit.target: Denne standardvisningen er felles for alle bindinger til i samlingen, som fører til at alle direkte bindinger til samlingen til å dele sortering, filter, grupper og egenskaper for gjeldende element på én standardvisningen.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can create a view of your collection in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] or code using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> class, and binding your control to that view.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også opprette en visning av samlingen i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] eller kode ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>klasse og binde kontrollen til denne visningen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel se [slik: sortering og gruppe Data ved hjelp av en visning i XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object reference to the binding source.
trans-unit.target: En objektreferanse til datakilden for binding.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView"></xref> object that is the default view for the given source collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView"> </xref> objekt som standardvisningen for den angitte kildesamlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects that describes how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samling av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"> </xref> objekter som beskriver hvordan elementene i samlingen er gruppert i visningen.

trans-unit.source: This property is forwarded to any collection view created from the current <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen videresendes til noen samlinger-visningen som er opprettet fra gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMorePropertyDescriptions* One or more elements that derive from the s abstract class.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *oneOrMorePropertyDescriptions* ett eller flere elementer som er avledet fra s abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: Typically this is a <xref:System.Windows.Data.PropertyGroupDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Dette er vanligvis en <xref:System.Windows.Data.PropertyGroupDescription>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.PropertyGroupDescription>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects that describes how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"> </xref> objekter som beskriver hvordan elementene i samlingen er gruppert i visningen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the given view is the default view for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den angitte visningen er standardvisningen for den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source*>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source*>

trans-unit.source: All collections have a default <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>.
trans-unit.target: Alle samlinger har en standardverdi <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: For all collections implementing <xref:System.Collections.IList>, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> object is the default view object.
trans-unit.target: For alle samlinger som implementerer <xref:System.Collections.IList>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>objektet er standard visningsobjekt.</xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> is the collection view class used for collections that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>Er Samlingsklasse for visningen brukes for samlinger som implementerer <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>

trans-unit.source: To get the default view, you use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For standardvisningen, bruker du den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The view object to check.
trans-unit.target: Vis-objektet til å kontrollere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the given view is the default view for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source*> collection or if the given view is <xref uid="langword_csharp_nulll" name="nulll" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte visningen er standardvisningen for den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source*>samlingen, eller hvis den angitte visningen <xref uid="langword_csharp_nulll" name="nulll" href=""> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource"></xref> is filtering data in real time.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource"> </xref> filtrering i sanntid.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if filtering data in real time is enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if live filtering is not enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live filtering.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis filtrering i sanntid er aktivert. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis live filtrering ikke er aktivert. <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ikke kan fastsette om visningen samlingen implementerer live filtrering.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien [avhengighet egenskapen verdien prioriteten](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.IsLiveFiltering*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.IsLiveFiltering*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.IsLiveFiltering*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource"></xref> should filter the data in real time if it can.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource"> </xref> skal filtrere dataene i sanntid hvis mulig.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if live filtering has been requested; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis live filtrering har blitt forespurt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien [avhengighet egenskapen verdien prioriteten](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if grouping data in real time is enable; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if live grouping is not enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live grouping.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects that describes how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samling av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> objekter som beskriver hvordan elementene i samlingen er sortert i visningen.

trans-unit.source: This property is forwarded to any collection view created from the current source.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen videresendes til en annen samling visning som er opprettet fra gjeldende kilde.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreSortDescriptions* One or more elements.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *oneOrMoreSortDescriptions* én eller flere elementer.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects that describes how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> objekter som beskriver hvordan elementene i samlingen er sortert i visningen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection object from which to create this view.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir collection-objekt å opprette denne visningen.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *myCollection* An existing collection.
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen | ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *myCollection* en eksisterende samling.

trans-unit.source: To refer to an existing collection, use the [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For å referere til en eksisterende samling, kan du bruke den [StaticResource Markup filtypen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
